text: Jack Danzey Jr. (14 February 1941 - 31 August 2020) was an Australian professional rugby league footballer, referee and administrator. He played in the NSWRFL Premiership for the Newtown, Balmain and Cronulla-Sutherland clubs during the 1960s. His career lasted from 1960 to 1968. He was born in Sydney. Danzey died on 31 August 2020 at the age of 79.Vale: Former leading referee Jack Danzey ==References== ==Other websites== *Jack Danzey player summary at Rugby League Project *Jack Danzey referee summary at Rugby League Project Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Australian rugby league players Category:Rugby league players from Sydney
title: Jack Danzey
